summary_comment: Professor Brooks is highly regarded for her dedication to student success,展现出她对学生成功的深切关怀。她知识渊博，善于与学生沟通，并且非常理解学生，允许开放笔记考试，鼓励积极参与课堂。总的来说，她是一位深受学生尊敬和喜爱的优秀教师。
summary_comment_short: Professor Brooks is highly regarded for her supportive and understanding approach, allowing open-note midterms and offering lenient grading to help students succeed. She is known for her extensive knowledge of the industry and her ability to connect with students, making her a beloved and respected professor.

Ratings.comment: Joyce is a teacher who truly wants her students to have the opportunity to succeed. She is super nice and understanding & allowed all of her midterms to be open-note. Loved this class!

I absolutely LOVE Joyce's classes. She is a very understanding teacher and knows a lot about the industry. She is very knowledgable and relates to students well. Joyce is the type of teacher that students respect and adore!

Joyce is one of my all time favorite professors. She is very lenient when it comes to grading and she cares about her studentswants them to succeed. She tells a lot of random stories but you learn to listen and laugh along. Great professor. Participation points given by signing in to each class.
